[api/model/product](/api/modules/api_model_product.md).CartItem

## Properties

### id

• **id**: `string`

Product ID

___

### name

• **name**: `string`

Product name

___

### qty

• **qty**: `number`

Amount of this item in the cart

___

### thumbnailId

• **thumbnailId**: `string`

___

### thumbnailUrl

• **thumbnailUrl**: `string`

URL to .enc file of the thumbnail. Just change the filetype to .jpg to view the thumbnail
